vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (CEtherHarness.sol#3078-3093) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (CEtherHarness.sol#3080-3082)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (CEtherHarness.sol#2832-2834) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- adminOrInitializing (CEtherHarness.sol#4488-4492)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: Comp.getChainId (CEtherHarness.sol#3390-3397) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (CEtherHarness.sol#1134-1196) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (CEtherHarness.sol#1160)
	-transferFrom (CEtherHarness.sol#1174)

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
Comp._writeCheckpoint (CEtherHarness.sol#3356-3369) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
CEther.getCashPrior (CEtherHarness.sol#2750-2756) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(err == MathError.NO_ERROR)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (CEtherHarness.sol#2417-2429):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CEtherHarness.sol#2418-2419)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CEtherHarness.sol#2425-2426)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (CEtherHarness.sol#2480-2490):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (CEtherHarness.sol#2481-2482)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (CEtherHarness.sol#2487-2488)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (CEtherHarness.sol#2349-2368):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (CEtherHarness.sol#2357-2358)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (CEtherHarness.sol#2360-2361)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (CEtherHarness.sol#2545-2555):
